name: Mono Truckers
description:
Mono Truckers is a game where you you take jobs and make deliveries to different locations inspired by games like Euro Truck Sim and Simpsons Road Rage.

Deliveries give you money, hitting cars costs you money for repairs. Earn enough and you can retire, lose too much and you will go bankrupt.

--Controls--

WASD - Move

E - Take a new job

Q - Open upgrade menu

Drive to the destination to earn cash marked with an X on the minimap, just simply drive towards the person standing by the road to complete your job.

Watch out for other cars, crashing into them you lose you money for repairs.

In the upgrade menu, invest in retirement to complete the game.

Thank you for playing, good luck and have fun.
